title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Kiro: Your agentic IDE for spec-driven development (DVT209)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Kiro：您的智能代理 IDE，用于规范驱动开发 (DVT209)
abstract: In this session, learn how Kiro is helping you go from idea to production faster with spec-driven development. Learn how to delagate and automate development tasks using Kiro's agent hooks, multimodal agent chat and MCP support. We'll show you how Kiro’s agents challenge you to think beyond the code and work alongside you to solve hard engineering problems with confidence.
abstract_cn: 在本次会议中，了解 Kiro 如何通过规范驱动开发帮助您更快地从想法到生产。学习如何使用 Kiro 的代理钩子、多模态代理聊天和 MCP 支持来委托和自动化开发任务。我们将向您展示 Kiro 的代理如何挑战您超越代码思考，并与您一起自信地解决复杂的工程问题。
